subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Braves designated the right-hander Lance Cormier for assignment to make room on their 40-man roster for the left-hander Tom Glavine. Glavine agreed last month to a one-year, $8 million deal to return to the team from the Mets. Cormier, 27, was 2-6 with a 7.09 earned run average in 10 games.
